TopicTitle: [0.90] Halo Inspired Paris Class Frigate (LLL required)

Articles.Content:
Paris Class "Science" Frigate (Halo Inspired)

I don't often see many Halo spaceships on here, so I had a go using LLL parts!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/669/Paris%20Class%20%22Science%22%20Frigate

For Reference, here is what the ACTUAL Paris Class Frigate looks like

*Please note this was not a COMPLETE representation, I kept it simple and functional so that it can still be practical in KSP game whilst looking stylish!

Is it just me, or does that ship look an awful lot like a gun.

Either way, +rep for the replica!

that ship look an awful lot like a gun.

That's basically what (human) ships from the Haloverse are. Missile pods, hangers, and a reactor room wrapped around a giant magnetic accelerator cannon.
